card_10.cardText:
What's next? Many reunited families will be deported, while others may seek asylum, but remember, in June Attorney General Sessions said gang & domestic violence would no longer be grounds for asylum.

[view sources](https://smarthernews.com/18-07-26-mexico-immigration/)
